attributes.title: Not what I expected
attributes.review: So all my friends are Trump supporters so I thought I’d check it out. Pretty disappointed about the whole thing.

attributes.title: 🤪 it never worked 😘🤣
attributes.review: I was never able to sign into my account

attributes.title: Just nooo..
attributes.review: Taking down tho one thing people can stay inside thru the whole corona thing so pay back

attributes.title: Keeps crashing
attributes.review: Not apart of gen z ahaha but really this app keeps crashing 🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️ hate this app. Can’t believe this is what our great country is giving us for us.

attributes.title: not a gamer moment
attributes.review: this is not it, the quality of this game is awful. it immediately installs many sketchy things to your p.c. and makes your computer run slower. multiple times a pop-up showed up asking me to buy things. not cool, would not recommend playing. it isn’t even a fun game.

attributes.title: well looks like i’m not voting
attributes.review: see i’m not even apart of those little ignorant kids from gen ztcabdvsk, but i was very disappointed in the quality of the app, it seemed like it would inform me more on his campaign but it’s truly just a terrible app that needs to be taken and down and replanned for a couple of years or so.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hope to support my great✨orange president✨but the app keeps crashing i have to constantly restart it and it gave me a virus 🦠🤢

attributes.title: Unnecessary
attributes.review: I honestly didn’t use the app but I heard it was about to a Cheeto and it’s like girl we all had Cheetos ain’t no reason for you to make a Cheeto app 😬 so like no❤️ but I fwu for trying ✨💕

attributes.title: Toes
attributes.review: I was told that if I downloaded this app Trump would send me a personalized video of him saying hi to me but all I got was a picture of his crusty green and orange toes 🤬 DONT get this app unless you want to look at crusty trump toes 🤮

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is slow and it took months to down load !!
